description:
今天的大学英语四级口语考试中，考到了个人陈述：the future of the Chinese languagein a globalized world，要求准备45秒，陈述1分钟，下面是小编给大家提供的参考范例。

In recent years, a great number of foreigners have come to China to learn Chinese. What’s more, over one hundred countries in the world have set Chinese language classes. Foreigners’ main purpose of learning Chinese is to travel in China, do business or learn about China and Chinese culture. Chinese people have always been peace loving and friendly. I believe In a globalized world, as the communication between Chinese and people around the world increases, more and more foreigners will be interested in Chinese culture and will learn Chinese language.
